name: Sivaranjani C
bio: Passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in building modern, scalable web applications. Dedicated to creating elegant solutions and seamless user experiences.

experience.description: Successfully delivered multiple web applications, ensuring high performance and responsive design across all devices.
Gained hands-on experience in full-stack development and collaborated with senior developers on key modules.
